channel.title: Need help finding rock drums
channel.description:
Imma need some rock music type of drums. I'm pretty sure you know what I mean
Are there any of these built into Auxy?

item.title: Need help finding rock drums
item.dc:creator: Dadmother
item.description:
The vintage snare addition is CRUCIAL. Right on!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help finding rock drums
item.dc:creator: cjflash99
item.description:
I use the itch drum kit a lot in my songs because I LOVE rock music. Keep share 01 and add vintage snare 76 and also I use the knock knock crash cymbal too.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help finding rock drums
item.dc:creator: Maland2016
item.description:
@TheRealJFalc put some good suggestions in, may I add that there’s probably a few kicks in the Kickdrum Collection (you’ll have to go digging yourself, sorry!) and a few snares tweaked a bit from Nu Disco that could work nicely!

If you don’t mind me asking, are you making a rock song in Auxy? It’s fun to try them, I’ve done a few that are more electronic-rock than anything, but that’s because we don’t have electric guitars yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help finding rock drums
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
I’d say look in the Organic Elements packs (both 1 and 2), along with possibly Neurofunk. If that all fails, Superfluidity and/or Crate Diggers may have what you need.

Read full topic
